CustomField.description: Deprecated: Was used to separate powermaps in two separate listviews
CustomField.formula: CASE(Role__c , 'Budget owner', 'Final decision makers', 'Approver', 'Final decision makers', 'Signature', 'Final decision makers', 'Makes recommendation','Recommenders and influencers', 'Has influence on decision','Recommenders and influencers', 'Unknown')
CustomField.label: Influence Group
